name: Backrooms Doors
description:
You embark on a dangerous journey through the Backrooms. Let's be honest, it's not the most comfortable place and you'll have to try your best to stay alive. Explore these endless corridors and rooms, run and hide from dangerous entities, and look for keys to locked doors. The deeper you delve into the backstage area, the more creepy dangers will come your way.

List of features:
- Atmospheric gameplay. Your only goal is to move further and further through the level in the hope that behind one of the doors there will be a way out. But always be on the lookout, danger may be waiting around every corner



- Levels. You are waiting for spaces in the existence of which it is hard to believe. It is hard to say who and why could build such a thing. You will have to pass through labyrinths of yellow rooms, dark basements and abandoned offices, and many other necessary places…



- Entities. You are completely defenseless against the inhabitants of this place, so if you notice something or hear strange sounds you better run, because it probably heard you too!



- Realistic graphics and sounds create the atmosphere of the original Backrooms Found Footages.
